title: The Water Knife
author: Paolo Bacigalupi
overview: In a future where water is scarce and controlled by corrupt figures, three individuals fight for their own survival and for others.

title: The Road
author: Cormac McCarthy
overview: A father and son traverse a landscape blasted by an unspecified cataclysm that has destroyed most of civilization.

title: Parable of the Sower
author: Octavia E. Butler
overview: In a future where society has collapsed due to climate change and wealth inequality, a young woman creates her own religion in hopes of saving humanity.

title: The Year of the Flood
author: Margaret Atwood
overview: Set in a future world devastated by a man-made plague, this novel tells the story of a religious sect, the God's Gardeners, who predicted the disaster and are now trying to recover.

author: George Orwell
overview: A social critique of totalitarianism and authoritarianism implemented by government bureaucracy in the historic year of 1984.

title: Foundation
author: Isaac Asimov
overview: A mathematician who has developed a concept of psychohistory, uses it to foresee the future and the eventual fall of the Galactic Empire.
tags: Galactic Empire, a future science fiction empire.

title: I, Robot
author: Isaac Asimov
overview: A collection of nine short stories sharing common theme of interaction between humans and robots and the ethical implications of it.
